name: Domain Report
author: Pearl Media

sections.description:
Information will be related to

1) Google indexed pages
2) google inbound links
3) Alexa rank
4) Alexa inbound links,
5) DMOZ listings,
6) Siteadvisor rating,
7) WOZ rating,
8) Domain age.

Visit solarwebtraffic.com/content to get free wordpress autoblog
sections.installation:
1. Upload domainreport.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Access pluging from Settings –> Domain-Report
sections.faq: For any question related to this plugin please visit jungleelab.com and use contact form to email me.

short_description: This plugin provide info related to your domain such as inbound links, rank, advisor rating etc..
